name: SSIG-SegPlate

notes: Visit https://www.shaip.com/blog/15-best-opensource-handwriting-dataset/ and follow the provider instructions.

preprocess: Use for evaluating character segmentation algorithms
limitations: License needs verification from canonical source
justification: Small dataset for License Plate Character Segmentation, provides a task for text detection and character segmentation (T2, T3) in a constrained domain.
